ResearchProjectDef.label: MH-6 Little Bird (Transport)
ResearchProjectDef.description: DESCRIPTION: The MH-6M is a helicopter designed for general small range transport of goods and personnel. BASIC STATS: Health: 500 LOGISTICS POTENTIAL: Cargo Capacity: 400kg Speed: 5 Passenger Capacity: 1-4 Fuel Per Tile: 5 Fuel Capacity: 300 Round Trip Range: 30 Full Range: 60 Internal Power: 500w ATTACK POTENTIAL: Bombing Run Capacity: n/a Precision Run Capacity: n/a Spread: n/a Distance between drops: n/a

ResearchProjectDef.label: MH-6 Little Bird (Attack)
ResearchProjectDef.description: DESCRIPTION: The AH-6M is a helicopter designed for small range attack runs, sacrificing storage, passenger and fuel capacity to maintain the same speed of its counterpart. BASIC STATS: Health: 600 LOGISTICS POTENTIAL: Cargo Capacity: 350kg Speed: 5 Passenger Capacity: 1-2 Fuel Per Tile: 5 Fuel Capacity: 250 Round Trip Range: 25 Full Range: 50 Internal Power: 250w ATTACK POTENTIAL: Bombing Run Capacity: 2 Precision Run Capacity: 1 Spread: 5 Distance between drops: 3

ResearchProjectDef.label: UH-1Y Venom (Attack)

ResearchProjectDef.label: UH-60 Blackhawk (Attack)
ResearchProjectDef.description: DESCRIPTION: The MH-60L DAP (Direct Action Penetrator) is a helicopter designed for medium to long range attack runs, sacrificing storage, passenger and fuel capacity to maintain the same speed of its counterpart. ResearchProjectDef.label: AH-1Z Viper (Attack)
ResearchProjectDef.description: DESCRIPTION: The AH-1Z is a helicopter designed for long range precision bombing, sacrificing bombing capacity for high-end computational computers for higher accuracy. BASIC STATS: Health: 1400 LOGISTICS POTENTIAL: Cargo Capacity: 500kg Speed: 8 Passenger Capacity: 1-2 Fuel Per Tile: 10 Fuel Capacity: 1060 Round Trip Range: 53 Full Range: 106 Internal Power: 700w ATTACK POTENTIAL: Bombing Run Capacity: 3 Precision Run Capacity: 7 Spread: 4 Distance between drops: 3

ResearchProjectDef.label: CH-46E Sea Knight (Transport)
ResearchProjectDef.description: DESCRIPTION: The CH-46E is a helicopter designed for long range huge capacity transport of goods and personnel. ResearchProjectDef.label: V-22 Osprey Knight (Transport)
ResearchProjectDef.description: DESCRIPTION: The V-22 is a helicopter designed for medium to long range quick deploy huge capacity transport of goods and personnel, sacrificing a bit of range and uses large amounts of fuel.
